_comment: Mod定義。タワーモジュールのprefix/suffix。各モジュールに最大2枠。トレードオフを作る。

prefixes.name: Burning
prefixes.description: Adds fire DoT (4 dmg/s, 2s) but -10% range.

prefixes.name: Freezing
prefixes.description: 15% chance to freeze 1s but -20% attack speed.

prefixes.name: Rapid
prefixes.description: +40% attack speed but -25% damage.

prefixes.name: Heavy
prefixes.description: +50% damage but -30% attack speed.

prefixes.name: Volatile
prefixes.description: 20% chance to deal 3x damage, 10% chance to misfire.

prefixes.name: Thundering
prefixes.description: 20% chance on hit: lightning chains to a nearby enemy (60px, 50% dmg). -10% damage.

prefixes.name: Vampiric
prefixes.description: Heal 5 HP on kill but -20% damage.

prefixes.name: Piercing
prefixes.description: +1 pierce but -10% projectile speed.

prefixes.name: Explosive
prefixes.description: On kill: 60px explosion dealing 30% of damage to nearby enemies.

prefixes.name: Toxic
prefixes.description: Poison DoT (2 dmg/s, 5s stacking). -5% attack speed.

prefixes.name: Arcane
prefixes.description: +30% cooldown reduction but -20% max HP.

prefixes.name: Berserker
prefixes.description: +80% damage when HP below 50%.

prefixes.description: On hit: 2 split projectiles (50% dmg). -15% damage.

prefixes.name: Gravitational

prefixes.name: Lucky
prefixes.description: +50% drop rate but -10% damage.

prefixes.name: Charged
prefixes.description: +100% attack speed but -40% range and -20% damage.

prefixes.name: Frostbound

prefixes.name: Blighted

prefixes.name: Sniper

prefixes.name: Echo
prefixes.description: 60% chance to fire an extra shot but -25% damage.
